modName: Asriel Volkihar Cute Vampire Young Boy
summary:
I apologize for my bad English before anything else.
This character was created from my personal tastes because, as you can see, they are something out of the ordinary for the aesthetics of the game.
By the type of body and face, I suggest dressing it with light things
descriptionHtml:
[u][left][u][b][i]This cute boy wears the YgNord breed. He was originally created to be a vampire so I suggest getting the real blood!
The heavy armor does not go very well for the size of the body, I recommend
using it as a murderer, thief, wizard or warrior with light armor.[/i][/b]
[/u][/left]
[/u]This mod I'm afraid is not standalone
The requirements are
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951]-ECE[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92656]-Ruby Red Vampire Eyes[/url]﻿
-SKSE Updated
-[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21921]Normal Dawnguard Vampire Faces[/url]﻿ (Optional)
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168]-ApachiiSkyHair[/url]﻿ (Male Pack)[u][i][b]
[/b][/i][/u][i][b]For a more vampiric and elegant look I highly recommend the following mods[/b][/i][u][i][b]

[/b][/i][/u][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81073][b]-Apachii Divine Elegance Store[/b][/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21701]-Elegant Vampire Armor [/url]﻿(Better Textures)[b]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52057]Hassildor - Player Home for Vampires[/url]﻿ (Awesome Home with a Beautful Sword in Volkihar Castle)
[/b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49847]Astaroth Horns Redone - Demon Horns[/url]
author: RizeKLevtham
